name: Outside the Box
description: The Cerritos is under assault by unknown forces and the galaxy (or a segment of it) is watching! Rescue the crew and find out who is responsible!
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Borg, Dominion, and Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Shaxs, Boimler, Penk, Insubordinate Mariner, or Crafty crew will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Shaxs, Boimler, Penk, Insubordinate Mariner, or Crafty
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Owosekun
featured_crew.flavor: Owosekun was picked for this mission because of her raw determination to act, which she shows again in the fighting ring with a knockout.

featured_crew.name: Boimler
featured_crew.flavor: Boimler was helping Rutherford with a transporter experiment and ended up phased after an accident.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Boimler
rewards.flavor: Bradward Boimler is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. He is desperate to prove himself a competent and valuable member of the crew.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: Owosekun
rewards.flavor: Owosekun was picked for this mission because of her raw determination to act, which she shows again in the fighting ring with a knockout.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Owosekun
rewards.flavor: Owosekun was picked for this mission because of her raw determination to act, which she shows again in the fighting ring with a knockout.

adventures.name: Discount Dilithium
adventures.description: Source discount dilithium for the Durases.

adventures.name: Crocodile Tears
adventures.description: Synthesize a fake orb for the gul.

adventures.name: Bestselling Photons
adventures.description: Get Quark the newest holonovel before anyone else.

adventures.name: Paid in Full
adventures.description: Settle Mariner's debts and end the crisis on the Cerritos.

rewards.name: Outside the Box
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Too Many Enterprises
adventures.description: Offer the Pakleds old ship parts Starfleet no longer needs.

adventures.name: Cheap Wine
adventures.description: Acquire Tulaberry wine at a deep discount.

adventures.name: Crocodile Tears
adventures.description: Synthesize a fake orb for the gul.

adventures.name: Paid in Full
adventures.description: Settle Mariner's debts and end the crisis on the Cerritos.

rewards.name: Outside the Box
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Boimler
rewards.flavor: Boimler was helping Rutherford with a transporter experiment and ended up phased after an accident.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "Hey Captain, we could really use some help over here! Someone's boarded our ship, the transporter's malfunctioning, and the computer isn't responding!"
"Less chatting, more clobbering, ensign! These invaders aren't gonna subdue themselves!"

"Hello, Cerritos crew! It appears you're enjoying my entertainment offering so far. And in turn, you will entertain my very lucrative audience, so that a certain member of your crew can pay down these debts she's accrued."
"Look, I swear, I have no idea who that could be. Probably Ensign Jenn. Let's not waste time pointing fingers, we've just got to take back the ship!"
"Hey Captain, we could really use some help over here! Someone's boarded our ship, the transporter's malfunctioning, and the computer isn't responding!"
"Less chatting, more clobbering, ensign! These invaders aren't gonna subdue themselves!"

"Hello, Cerritos crew! It appears you're enjoying my entertainment offering so far. And in turn, you will entertain my very lucrative audience, so that a certain member of your crew can pay down these debts she's accrued."
"Look, I swear, I have no idea who that could be. Probably Ensign Jenn. Let's not waste time pointing fingers, we've just got to take back the ship!"
"All right, Mariner, it's time for you to come clean! Getting creative with protocol is one thing, but we're not gonna last much longer! Give this guy what he wants so they leave us alone!"
"Okay, fine, maybe I have a few little debts. A Tear of the Prophet for a Cardassian gul, some tulaberry wine for some Andorian merchants...Earth for the Breen...that thing for Khan..."

responses.text: "What have they already paid you, Mariner?"
"How much were the Breen offering for Earth?"

screens.text: "Those aren't little debts!! The entire planet Earth!? ...Captain, what are we gonna do about this!?"
"No can do. These were 'no substitutions' kinds of deals."
"...I'm afraid I can't discuss payment with third parties."
"You're really not helping."
"Time is not on your side, Cerritos crew. You can hand over what you owe...or pay with your lives!"
"All right, Mariner, it's time for you to come clean! Getting creative with protocol is one thing, but we're not gonna last much longer! Give this guy what he wants so they leave us alone!"
"Okay, fine, maybe I have a few little debts. A Tear of the Prophet for a Cardassian gul, some tulaberry wine for some Andorian merchants...Earth for the Breen...that thing for Khan..."

responses.text: "What have they already paid you, Mariner?"
"How much were the Breen offering for Earth?"

screens.text: "Those aren't little debts!! The entire planet Earth!? ...Captain, what are we gonna do about this!?"
"No can do. These were 'no substitutions' kinds of deals."
"...I'm afraid I can't discuss payment with third parties."
"You're really not helping."
"Time is not on your side, Cerritos crew. You can hand over what you owe...or pay with your lives!"
